name: Aliens Abducted (itch)
description:
Aliens Abducted is a project made for the 2021 "Stop Waiting for Godot" Game Jam, the goal of which was to promote learning about the Godot engine.

At the time of making this I'd been tinkering with Godot for a few weeks but only in 2D. The goal of this project was to experiment with the 3d side of Godot.

Art assets are from quaternius.com 
The Toon Shader used was by Rafael Bordon
And the 3rd person controls are heavily based on Johnny Rouddro's Tutorial

Thanks for playing! If you enjoyed this check out some of the other games from the 2021 Stop Waiting for Godot Game Jam!
